item.description:
EASTERNMASSREIA.COM

This Thursday March 13th

Rockland Radisson Hotel

929 Hingham St.
Rockland, MA

Meeting time is 6:00PM





This Thursday March 13th

EASTERN MASS REIA

This Thursday March 13th




Rockland Radisson Hotel

929 Hingham St.
Rockland, MA


Meeting time is 6:00PM

"Empowering Your Future"
DON'T MISS OUT, NETWORK THE NETWORKS
Investors, Mentors, Financial Services, Brokers, Contractors, Management and Members from 4 Area REIAs, Foreclosures, Short Sales and REOs, Private Money, Business Resources, Entity Structure, Trusts, 1031 Exchanges, Emerging Markets Multi-Family, Land Development, Future Use, Green Technologies. ALL this and more under one roof. Please join us as we celebrate our Kick Off Event 2008 of the

EASTERN MASSACHUSETTS REAL ESTATE INVESTORS ASSOCIATION

Rockland Radisson Hotel 929 Hingham St. Rockland, MA (Exit 14 Rt 3) Thursday March 13th 2008 from 6:00-9:30 pm SEE YOU THERE
Food and Refreshments
For more info contact us info@easternmassreia.com
1 888 588 REIA Ext.701

Food and Refreshments

I have joined forces with John Ingram and several other South Shore investors in order to take this group to the next level. Come join us for over a 60 years of combined real estate experience to share with our members.



Join before March 10th and SAVE, e-mail us membership@easternmassreia.com

Remainder of 2008 Individual $99 Partner/Spouse $169

After March 10th yearly Individual $160 Partner/Spouse $275

Business Resource Providers interested in learning about opportunities for sponsorship e-mail us businessresources@easternmassreia.com or call 1 888 588 REIA Ext.701

Join now and enjoy all the benefits of membership at a fraction of the cost.

Eastern Mass REIA is evolving.
Come be a part of the change

I look forward to us having a very prosperous 2008.



Derek Ebrecht



p.s. This is Our monthly networking, education, and deal making event, here at Eastern Mass REIA, if you have a deal let us know.






Eastern Massachusetts Real Estate Investors Association (Formally AREI-south)

Eastern Massachusetts REIA does not claim to give expert advice in investing, nor do we endorse what featured speakers say. We do not give professional, legal, financial or tax advice. We suggest that you get competent licensed counsel before putting into effect anything you hear in our club, whether in private conversation or something said publicly. The ideas presented are only meant to stimulate your thoughts in the field of real estate investing and are not to be taken as professional advice. All investing comes with risk; therefore, as adults, it is your responsibility to exercise due diligence before making any purchase, great or small. We encourage you to be careful when ordering coffee at a McDonalds drive through window...coffee is usually hot.
